name: AI Spend Tab
description: 5th tab for Beta Management dashboard showing AI cost analytics: stat cards (total spend, avg cost/user, cache savings, requests), spend by feature horizontal bars, model usage breakdown table, stacked daily spend trend chart, and top users by AI spend table.
prompt: /prototype 'AI Spend tab for Beta Management dashboard' --fidelity concept --chrome none --name ai-spend-tab

versions.notes: Full tab layout matching existing Engagement tab patterns: time range pills, 4-column stat cards with sparklines, two-column feature/model breakdown, stacked area chart, user spend table
